Xuanhuaceratops

One of the earliest ceratopsians, Xuanhuaceratops lived in the Jurassic period. It was very small, measuring 3 feet long and 6 kilograms in weight.

In Game

Xuanhuaceratops is often found in small to medium sized herds and it can easily be killed by any creature. It does not provide a lot of food by itself and it is quite fast as well. It is extremely sensitive to its surroundings and is very skittish in nature.
